div.p: RESUSCITATION the fame with refurrection and revivification. See the preceding article and Re-animatΓon.

The term reſufiitation, however, is more particularly uſed by chemiſts for the reproducing a mixed body from its aſhes ; an ail to which many have pretended,, as to reproduce plants, &c. from their aſhes.
